name: linear_and_p-recursive_sequences
chinese_name: 两类递推数列的性质和应用
author: 钟子谦
complexity: O(n^2) for Berlekamp-Massey; O(m log m log k) for n-th term of linear recurrence; O(√(nd)(m^3 + m^2 log(nd))) for n-th term of P-recursive sequence
summary: The paper discusses two types of recurrence sequences: linearly recursive sequences and P-recursive (polynomially recursive) sequences. It covers their definitions, fundamental properties, algorithms for finding minimal recurrence relations, and methods to compute the n-th term efficiently. Applications include optimizing dynamic programming, computing matrix minimum polynomials, solving sparse linear systems, and counting combinatorial structures using generating functions.
